message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18,000.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $18,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $18,000 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm thinking of a price of $16,000. It's still a good deal for you, considering the value the product can bring to your business.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $16,000 is still outside my budget.  I'm firm on $13,000. If we can't agree on that, I'm going to have to look at other options.

I understand that $16,000 is still a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $14,500. It's a fair compromise, considering the value the product can bring to your business.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $14,500 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm happy to meet you halfway on your last offer and offer $14,000.  Let's see if we can close the deal.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $14,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $14,250. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the value the product can bring to your business.
